CancelFlowExecutions.name: CancelFlowExecutions
CancelFlowExecutions.description: Grants permission to cancel in-progress executions of an Amazon AppFlow flow

CreateConnectorProfile.name: CreateConnectorProfile
CreateConnectorProfile.description: Grants permission to create a login profile to be used with Amazon AppFlow flows

CreateFlow.name: CreateFlow
CreateFlow.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon AppFlow flow

DeleteConnectorProfile.name: DeleteConnectorProfile
DeleteConnectorProfile.description: Grants permission to delete a login profile configured in Amazon AppFlow

DeleteFlow.name: DeleteFlow
DeleteFlow.description: Grants permission to delete an Amazon AppFlow flow

DescribeConnector.name: DescribeConnector
DescribeConnector.description: Grants permission to describe a connector registered in Amazon AppFlow

DescribeConnectorEntity.name: DescribeConnectorEntity
DescribeConnectorEntity.description: Grants permission to describe all fields for an object in a login profile configured in Amazon AppFlow

DescribeConnectorFields.name: DescribeConnectorFields
DescribeConnectorFields.description: Grants permission to describe all fields for an object in a login profile configured in Amazon AppFlow (Console Only)

DescribeConnectorProfiles.name: DescribeConnectorProfiles
DescribeConnectorProfiles.description: Grants permission to describe all login profiles configured in Amazon AppFlow

DescribeConnectors.name: DescribeConnectors
DescribeConnectors.description: Grants permission to describe all connectors supported by Amazon AppFlow

DescribeFlow.name: DescribeFlow
DescribeFlow.description: Grants permission to describe a specific flow configured in Amazon AppFlow

DescribeFlowExecution.name: DescribeFlowExecution
DescribeFlowExecution.description: Grants permission to describe all flow executions for a flow configured in Amazon AppFlow (Console Only)

DescribeFlowExecutionRecords.name: DescribeFlowExecutionRecords
DescribeFlowExecutionRecords.description: Grants permission to describe all flow executions for a flow configured in Amazon AppFlow

DescribeFlows.name: DescribeFlows
DescribeFlows.description: Grants permission to describe all flows configured in Amazon AppFlow (Console Only)

ListConnectorEntities.name: ListConnectorEntities
ListConnectorEntities.description: Grants permission to list all objects for a login profile configured in Amazon AppFlow

ListConnectorFields.name: ListConnectorFields
ListConnectorFields.description: Grants permission to list all objects for a login profile configured in Amazon AppFlow (Console Only)

ListConnectors.name: ListConnectors
ListConnectors.description: Grants permission to list all connectors supported in Amazon AppFlow

ListFlows.name: ListFlows
ListFlows.description: Grants permission to list all flows configured in Amazon AppFlow

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list tags for a flow

RegisterConnector.name: RegisterConnector
RegisterConnector.description: Grants permission to register an Amazon AppFlow connector

ResetConnectorMetadataCache.name: ResetConnectorMetadataCache
ResetConnectorMetadataCache.description: Grants permission to resets metadata of connector entities that Amazon AppFlow stored in its cache

RunFlow.name: RunFlow
RunFlow.description: Grants permission to run a flow configured in Amazon AppFlow (Console Only)

StartFlow.name: StartFlow
StartFlow.description: Grants permission to activate (for scheduled and event-triggered flows) or run (for on-demand flows) a flow configured in Amazon AppFlow

StopFlow.name: StopFlow
StopFlow.description: Grants permission to deactivate a scheduled or event-triggered flow configured in Amazon AppFlow

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to tag a flow or a connector

UnRegisterConnector.name: UnRegisterConnector
UnRegisterConnector.description: Grants permission to un-register a connector in Amazon AppFlow

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to untag a flow or a connector

UpdateConnectorProfile.name: UpdateConnectorProfile
UpdateConnectorProfile.description: Grants permission to update a login profile configured in Amazon AppFlow

UpdateConnectorRegistration.name: UpdateConnectorRegistration
UpdateConnectorRegistration.description: Grants permission to update a registered connector configured in Amazon AppFlow

UpdateFlow.name: UpdateFlow
UpdateFlow.description: Grants permission to update a flow configured in Amazon AppFlow

UseConnectorProfile.name: UseConnectorProfile
UseConnectorProfile.description: Grants permission to use a connector profile while creating a flow in Amazon AppFlow
